channel.title: [Class Suggestion]Romeo and Juliet
channel.description:
# Romeo **Neutral Offensive**
**Passive (Way of the Sword)** - You are night, occupy and redirection immune. **Night Ability (Wine)** - Occupy a player.(Infinite uses) **Night Ability (Propose)** - Propose to a player, will only work if the target is Juliet. Can not be interrupted. (1 use)
# Juliet **Neutral Investigative**
**Day Ability (Hide)** - Tonight you will hide from all visits by other players.(3 uses) **Night Ability (Check Horoscope Compatibility)** - Check love compatibility between 2 players. Male and female classes are compatible with each other. Fool, Mastermind and Cult Leader are not compatible with any classes. Prince is compatible with all other classes.(Infinite uses) **Night Ability (Accept)** - Accept a proposal, will only work if the target is Romeo. Can not be interrupted.(1 use)
**Goal :** Survive to marry each other at the wedding.
The couple have 5 days to find love. After night 5 they will both suicide. If Romeo or Juliet dies before Day 6, the other lover will enter a frenzied state (lose all passives, abilities and gain **Night Ability (Poisoned dagger)** - Attack a player (1 use)) with a new goal to seek revenge on the killer before committing suicide. If one lover is executed during the day, the killer will be the first accuser.
If the proposal is successful at night, the couple will marry each other next night at the wedding (provided they survive the proposal night and the following day). All surviving (BD?) players are invited to the wedding.(Skip the night?)

item.title: [Class Suggestion]Romeo and Juliet
item.dc:creator: Qwert
item.description:
Yeah I realise the gender thing is going to be controversial. Personally I threw that in for the sake of deduction. I dont personally know who is male who is female.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion]Romeo and Juliet
item.dc:creator: Qwert
item.description:
Insanity:

This is a little bit too disruptive for Unseen/Cult.

Only BD are invited, aka skip a night

Insanity:

Also make this into a passive.

Yeah, that counts as a passive. A bit too long I didnt want to cram the space.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion]Romeo and Juliet
item.dc:creator: Qwert
item.description:
The wedding is designed to harm bd. The couple must survive the proposal night and the next day. So Bd can just kill one of them during this next day.

item.description:
it seems great but what prevents them from both outing and just winning there needs to be some reason why they wouldn’t reveal I think personally
